TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ModelProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表 上的屬性。

span.span: A represents a property on a .

summary.span: 模型屬性會與項目的執行個體相關聯，使其可以具有簡單的值 get/set 屬性，而非使用較繁瑣的 GetValue/SetValue 機制。

span.span: Model properties are associated with an instance of an item, which allows them to have simple Value get/set properties instead of using the more cumbersome GetValue/SetValue mechanism of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值可能來自於區域設定值，也可以繼承自項目階層中較高的層級。The value of a may come from a locally set value, or it may be inherited from somewhere higher up in the element hierarchy. 使用 所傳回的值之 屬性，即可判斷屬性值的來源。Use the property of the value returned by to determine the source of the property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若未設定屬性的區域數值，可能會從屬性階層中較高的層級繼承值。When there is no local value set for the property, a value may be inherited from higher in the property hierarchy. 如果您想要將值設為`null`，呼叫改為。If you wish to set the value to `null`, call instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎型別轉換子皆經過包裝，因此可接受 物件。Underlying type converters are all wrapped so they accept objects. 執行轉換成特定數值時，型別轉換子的傳回型別不會經過包裝。When performing a conversion to a particular value, the type converter’s return type is not wrapped. 傳回標準數值的型別轉換子，也傳回當做 物件的值。Type converters that return standard values also return values as objects.

span.span: Sets a local value on a property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `value` 不是 ，就會包裝在傳回呼叫端的 中。If `value` is not a , it is wrapped in a , which is returned to the caller. 它是有效設定`value`至`null`的情況下將`null`。It is valid to set `value` to `null`, in which case will be `null`. 這種做法不同於呼叫 。This is different from calling . > [!NOTE] > 使用此方法時，值將不會設定基礎的屬性上的編輯內容的作業完成之前。Using this method, the value will not be set on the underlying property until the editing context completes. 若要立即更新基礎的屬性，請使用。To update the underlying property immediately, use .

span.span: Returns the property value as a , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可能會傳回值，會進一步繼承的向上所在的項目階層的大小寫這個屬性會傳回值，其不`this`。A property may return a value that is inherited further up the element hierarchy, in which case this property will return a value whose is not `this`. 如果沒有值從未設定屬性會傳回`null`。If no value has ever been set for the property will return `null`.
